mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, CND_SNO, ANA_VAR_ID, COL_PNM, CND_CD, OPR_CD, CND_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, CND_SNO, ANA_VAR_ID, COL_PNM, CND_CD, OPR_CD, CND_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cndSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oprCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CND_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND WHERE UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
INSERT INTO WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND
UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,
CRE_COMP_ID,
CND_SNO,
ANA_VAR_ID,
COL_PNM,
CND_CD,
OPR_CD,
CND_VAL,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cndSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{oprCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, 'C', #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now()
mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND
ANA_VAR_ID = #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_PNM = #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CND_CD = #{cndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPR_CD = #{oprCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CND_VAL = #{cndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CND_SNO = #{cndSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND set ANA_VAR_ID = #{anaVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_PNM = #{colPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CND_CD = #{cndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPR_CD = #{oprCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CND_VAL = #{cndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CND_SNO = #{cndSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , B.CND_SNO , B.ANA_VAR_ID , B.COL_PNM , B.CND_CD , B.OPR_CD , B.CND_VAL FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.CRE_COMP_ID = A.CRE_COMP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , B.CRE_COMP_ID , C.ANA_DASE_NM , D.ANA_DASE_NM AS SRC_ANA_DASE_NM , A.CND_CONTS , B.COL_PNM , B.CND_CD , B.OPR_CD , B.CND_VAL FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV A INNER JOIN WAD_UODC_DASE_CND_DV_CND B ON B.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID AND B.CRE_COMP_ID = A.CRE_COMP_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE C ON C.ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE D ON D.ANA_DASE_ID = A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY B.CND_SNO
